Echelon: Jukebox

A guide on the current and upcoming features of the app

90%

Purpose

The Jukebox is Echelon's primary feature. The initial idea for the app was to create a way for groups of friends or venues to let everyone queue up music on one device.

When songs are in the queue, listeners can can upvote songs they want to listen to, bringing those songs to the top of the queue. The songs closer to the top of the queue will be played sooner than those on the bottom, as the player plays songs from the top of the queue.

Progress

The Jukebox is the only mode being actively worked on at the moment, as it is the primary feature of the app. The Jukebox is functional and users can join the group, add songs, vote, and the leader can play the queue. The functionality and design of the Jukebox is currently being refined and prepped for the public beta release.
